body:
The typical one will always make me laugh:
"Damn, he's blackmailing me and I even end up abusing me for it in addition to humiliating me... I have no choice but to fall in love with him and leave aside the one who really interests me not only as a sexual object"
Basically, you have to laugh at how stupid the women are on NTRs.
Author smoothing out his artstyle, but overall good. Going with the X ray style always makes deepthroat look good
Romance is prohibited etc etc... Ngl art still does it for me tho it is pretty rough
